TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ObjectManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 在对象进行反序列化时对其进行跟踪。

span.span: Keeps track of objects as they are deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在反序列化期间查询以确定是否对序列化流中的对象的引用指已被反序列化的对象 （向后引用），或尚未进行的对象反序列化 （前向引用）。During deserialization, the queries the to determine whether a reference to an object in the serialized stream refers to an object that has already been deserialized (a backward reference), or to an object that has not yet been deserialized (a forward reference). 如果序列化流中的引用前向引用，则可以注册使用修正。If the reference in the serialized stream is a forward reference, then the can register a fixup with the . 如果序列化流中的引用的向后引用立即完成该引用。If the reference in the serialized stream is a backward reference, the immediately completes the reference. 链接地址信息是指完成的对象引用尚未完成对象反序列化过程中的过程。Fixup refers to the process of finalizing object references not already completed during the object deserialization process. 所需的对象被反序列化后，将完整参考。After the required object has been deserialized, the will complete the reference. 遵循一组规则，规定修正的顺序。The follows a set of rules that dictate the fixup order. 实现的所有对象或具有肯定通过它们传输的所有对象对象树反序列化时可用。All objects that implement or have a can expect to have all the objects that they transmitted through available when the object tree is deserialized. 但是，父对象不能假设，所有子对象将被完全都完成完全反序列化时。However, a parent object cannot presume that all its child objects will be fully completed when it is fully deserialized. 所有子对象将都会显示，但并非所有孙级对象将一定都会显示。All child objects will be present but not all the grandchild objects will necessarily be present. 如果对象需要执行某些操作，取决于在其子对象上执行代码，它可以延迟这些操作，实现接口，并执行代码，仅当它此接口上调用返回。If an object needs to take certain actions that depend on executing code on its child objects, it can delay these actions, implement the interface, and execute the code only when it is called back on this interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来遍历对象图，只有一次遍历每个对象。The following code example shows how to use the class to walk through an object graph, traversing to each object only once. [!code-csharp[ObjectManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/ObjectManager/CS/ObjectManager.cs#1)]

span.span: Performs all the recorded fixups.

span.span: Registers a member of an object as it is deserialized, associating it with , and recording the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你需要提供`member`并`idOfContainingObj`参数如果`obj`是由于的方式执行修正对象。You need to provide the `member` and `idOfContainingObj` parameters if `obj` is a because of the way fixups are performed on objects. 要存储的信息的空间内联使用其包含的对象分配。The space to store the information for a is allocated inline with its containing object. 但是，当装箱要通过注册，它将失去与的包含对象的连接。However, when the is boxed to be registered with the , it loses the connection with its containing object. 若要保证修正出现的实例中存储中包含的对象和未装箱的实例，保留一些附加信息。To guarantee that fixups occur in the instance of the stored in the containing object and not in the boxed instance, the retains some additional information. 将保留信息有关的对象和其 id。 retains information about both the object and its ID. 以后在反序列化期间可以用于发现是否是特定的对象 ID 已反序列化，或尚未是否它前向引用的对象不是反序列化。Later during deserialization, can be used to discover whether a particular object ID has already been deserialized, or whether it is a forward reference to an object not yet deserialized.
